description.value: Veteran Talent Requirement: Character personally slays at least seven foes and gains 4+ Degrees of Success on an Intimidate Test when fighting against the forces of a specific kind of enemy over the course of a single mission. Once per Encounter as a Free Action while fighting chosen foe, character can spend a Fate Point and make a +0 Intimidate Test, if successful they gain Fear(1) Trait against chosen foe until the end of the encounter.
